page.title: 06Local News (4), Bowness.
page.content: { Cross Lake Swim Friday 12th July Once a year{Troutbeck Bridge Swimming {Club}organises a swim across Lake Windermere. At{6pm}there is a briefing and then everyone rows across to the other side of the lake,opposite to Millerground. When all the swimmers have been covered in Vaseline they get in the water in a line and the starting gun goes and the swimmers set off. The swimmers have to find their boat with their{rower}and{lifesaver}in it. It is about 1 mile across and soon the swimmers are spread out. There are {trophies}for the{first man}and the {first lady}across and there are also {records}for each{stroke.}After the race everyone goes back to the pool and uses the showers there. At the pool there is also something to eat and drink.
